tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE healthcare_professionals (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  specialty VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  license_number VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL,
  certification VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  blockchain_hash VARCHAR(64) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE healthcare_professionals (
 id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 name VARCHAR(255),
 license_number VARCHAR(50),
 certification VARCHAR(100),
 blockchain_hash VARCHAR(255)
)

CREATE TABLE credential_verification (
 id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 professional_id INT,
 verified_date DATE,
 verifier VARCHAR(100),
 verification_status BOOLEAN,
 FOREIGN KEY (professional_id) REFERENCES healthcare_professionals(id)
)

CREATE TABLE healthcare_professionals (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(255),
    email VARCHAR(255),
    credential VARCHAR(255),
    certification VARCHAR(255)
)

CREATE TABLE verification_logs (
    log_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    professional_id UUID,
    verification_date DATE,
    verified_by VARCHAR(255)
)

CREATE TABLE blockchain_transactions (
    trans_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    log_id UUID,
    transaction_hash VARCHAR(255),
    block_number INT
)

CREATE TABLE Credentials (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    professional_id INT NOT NULL,
    credential_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    issue_date DATE NOT NULL,
    expiration_date DATE,
    FOREIGN KEY (professional_id) REFERENCES HealthcareProfessionals(id)
);

CREATE TABLE Certifications (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    professional_id INT NOT NULL,
    certification_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    issue_date DATE NOT NULL,
    expiration_date DATE,
    FOREIGN KEY (professional_id) REFERENCES HealthcareProfessionals(id)
);

CREATE TABLE BlockchainRecords (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    professional_id INT NOT NULL,
    record_hash VARCHAR(128) NOT NULL,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
    FOREIGN KEY (professional_id) REFERENCES HealthcareProfessionals(id)
);

CREATE TABLE healthcare_professionals (
    professional_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    profession VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    certification_id UUID UNIQUE NOT NULL,
    certification_date DATE NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE certifications (
    certification_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    certification_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    issuing_authority VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    verification_blockchain_address VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE verification_logs (
    log_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    professional_id UUID NOT NULL,
    certification_id UUID NOT NULL,
    verification_timestamp TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
    verification_result BOOLEAN NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE blockchain_addresses (
    professional_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    blockchain_address VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE verification_statistics (
    stat_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    total_verifications INTEGER NOT NULL,
    successful_verifications INTEGER NOT NULL,
    failed_verifications INTEGER NOT NULL,
    verification_success_rate DECIMAL(5, 2) NOT NULL
)
